Package edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance

Classes pertaining to distance measurement.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DistanceFunction
    Interface to be implemented with a custom distance function.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLatLonDist
    Latitude/longitude utilities.
    ChebyshevDistance
    k-dimensional Chebyshev's distance.
    Distances
    Class containing factory methods to instantiate various common distance functions that implement the DistanceFunction functional interface.
    EquirectangularDistance
    Equirectangular distance for latitude/longitude coordinates.
    EuclideanDistance
    k-dimensional Euclidean distance.
    HaversineDistance
    Haversine distance for latitude/longitude coordinates.
    KDPoint
    Class to represent a point in k-dimensional space.
    ManhattanDistance
    k-dimensional Manhattan distance.
    SquaredEquirectangularDistance
    Squared equirectangular distance for latitude/longitude coordinates.
    SquaredEuclideanDistance
    k-dimensional squared Euclidean distance.

Package edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance Description

Classes pertaining to distance measurement.
Author:
Justin Horvitz
